personal.name: Steven Granquist
personal.title: Senior Systems Architect
personal.metaDescription: Steven Granquist - Senior Systems Architect Portfolio

banner.helpText:
Type 'help' to see available commands.
Type 'about' to learn more about me.

This terminal supports command history (↑/↓) and tab completion.

summary: I am a Senior Systems Architect specializing in designing and implementing scalable, secure, and cost-efficient infrastructure solutions across cloud, hybrid, and on-prem environments. With over 10 years of hands-on experience, I've led technical transformations for AI-driven healthcare platforms, education technology companies, and enterprise SaaS providers.

At Aiforia Technologies, I architect cloud infrastructure that supports AI/ML workloads in regulated healthcare environments. As a member of the cybersecurity team and HIPAA Security Officer, I integrate secure-by-design principles into every layer of the stack. My work spans multi-cloud orchestration (GCP, Azure, AWS), containerized deployments with Kubernetes and Docker, and Infrastructure as Code with Terraform — all tailored to meet strict compliance and performance needs.

Previously, at Read Naturally, I directed full-spectrum infrastructure initiatives — from cloud migrations and DevOps pipeline automation to disaster recovery and cost-optimization strategies. My foundation in Linux systems administration and scripting, combined with a collaborative approach to cross-functional teamwork, enables me to solve complex challenges efficiently and sustainably.
about.philosophy: I bring a holistic, security-first perspective to every project — ensuring that the systems I build are not only robust and scalable but also aligned with real business outcomes.

positions.title: Senior Systems Architect
responsibilities: Architect cloud infrastructure supporting AI/ML workloads in regulated healthcare environments
Serve as HIPAA Security Officer and member of cybersecurity team
Integrate secure-by-design principles into every layer of the stack
Multi-cloud orchestration across GCP, Azure, and AWS
Containerized deployments with Kubernetes and Docker
Infrastructure as Code implementation with Terraform
Ensure strict compliance and performance requirements are met

positions.title: Infrastructure Lead
responsibilities: Led cloud migrations and DevOps pipeline automation
Implemented disaster recovery and cost-optimization strategies
Cross-functional collaboration with development and IT teams
Established infrastructure best practices and documentation

experience.linkedInText: For a complete work history, visit my LinkedIn profile
